# Beijing

## Overview

Beijing is the capital of China and one of the world's most populous cities. It has been the political center of China for most of the past eight centuries.

## Key Facts

- **Country**: China
- **Founded**: 1045 BC
- **Elevation**: 44 meters
- **Area**: 16,411 kmÂ²

## Notable Features

Beijing is home to the Forbidden City, Tiananmen Square, and numerous UNESCO World Heritage sites. It hosted the 2008 and 2022 Olympic Games.
